channel.title: Diary on wenzhan
channel.description: Recent content in Diary on wenzhan

item.title: Digital Detox
item.description:
Today is my digital detox day. I’m going to turn of all my remote communication methods related to SOSAD.FUN, and have a good sleep, and eat well, and exercise, and be myself.
I don’t usually do this. I made this decision 13h ago. It was 9am. I have not slept for another day or so. It was my typical day. Suddenly, I felt my heart. By felt, I mean, I reasoned that something must have had went wrong with my heart.
